nodes.text: The Cult of Chak'ror was a Nikto sect whose members were known as the Chak'ror Warriors. At some point before the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, the cultists faced an ultimatum from Governor Uhika: they had to serve as her shock troops or be wiped out. The cult chose the former for a time, but ended up on their own again after Uhika died. At least one Chak'ror Warrior joined the crew of the Smuggler, an individual from Burnin Konn who led an Uprising against the Galactic Empire.
The Cult of Chak'ror and its Warriors were created for the mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, which was developed by Kabam for iOS and Android platforms and released in 2015.
